item.title: Copilot Nearly Erased My Coding Memory
item.description:
1. Introduction

    • Attention-grabbing start with the chosen title
    • Brief personal background in coding

  2. Discovering the Impact of Copilot

    • Initial excitement and convenience
    • Realization of diminishing recall for coding practices

  3. The Struggle with Forgetting

    • Specific examples of forgotten coding concepts
    • How reliance on suggestions affected confidence

  4. The Importance of Active Coding

    • The role of continuous practice in skill retention
    • Comparison of manual coding vs. AI-assisted coding

  5. Finding a Path Forward

    • Strategies for balancing Copilot use with traditional coding
    • Tips for maintaining and improving coding skills

  6. Conclusion
